content: उन्नी {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To lead upwards, bring up. {@--2@} To raise, erect, lift up (<ab>A.</ab>); दंडमुन्नयते <ls>Sk.</ls>; स्वदंष्ट्रोन्नीतधरो वराहः <ls>Bhāg.</ls> {@--3@} To bring out of, free from, help, rescue, redeem; रसाया लीलयोन्नीतां उर्वीं <ls>Bhāg.</ls> {@--4@} To draw up (as water). {@--5@} To stroke; straighten out. {@--6@} To lead out or aside, lead away; एकांतमुन्नीय <ls>Mb.</ls> {@--7@} To press out, extract. {@--8@} To infer, ascertain, guess, conjecture; कथमपि स इत्युन्नेतव्यस्तथापि दृशोः प्रियः <ls>U. 3. 22</ls>, <ls n="U.">1. 29</ls>, <ls n="U.">6. 26</ls>; <ls>V. 4</ls>; प्रकृतिप्रत्ययाद्यर्थैः संकीर्णे लिंगमुन्नयेत् <ls>Ak.</ls> {@--9@} To fill completely. {@--10@} To lead off (in singing).
